price: 189. Tokkel kaa dirabboyseeniih, gayrantuy ken silaalisa-le ayróh digaalá ken tibbixeeh ken finqisse, diggah woh kaxxa ayróh digaalá kinni.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhahum ʿadhābu yawmi al-ẓulati innahu kāna ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
